verses.plain: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
O give thanks unto the God of gods: for his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: O give thanks unto the God of gods: for his mercy

verses.plain: O give thanks to the Lord of lords: for his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: O give thanks to the Lord of lords: for his mercy

verses.plain: To him who alone doeth great wonders: for his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: To him who alone doeth great wonders: for his mercy

verses.plain: To him that by wisdom made the heavens: for his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: To him that by wisdom made the heavens: for his mercy

verses.plain: To him that stretched out the earth above the waters: for his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: To him that stretched out the earth above the waters: for his mercy

verses.plain: To him that made great lights: for his mercy endureth for ever:

tokens.t: To him that made great lights: for his mercy

verses.plain: The sun to rule by day: for his mercy endureth for ever:

tokens.t: The sun to rule by day: for his mercy

verses.plain: The moon and stars to rule by night: for his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: The moon and stars to rule by night: for his mercy

verses.plain: To him that smote Egypt in their firstborn: for his mercy endureth for ever:

tokens.t: To him that smote Egypt in their firstborn: for his mercy

verses.plain: And brought out Israel from among them: for his mercy endureth for ever:

tokens.t: And brought out Israel from among them: for his mercy

verses.plain: With a strong hand, and with a stretched out arm: for his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: With a strong hand, and with a stretched out arm: for his mercy

verses.plain: To him which divided the Red sea into parts: for his mercy endureth for ever:

tokens.t: To him which divided the Red sea into parts: for his mercy

verses.plain: And made Israel to pass through the midst of it: for his mercy endureth for ever:

tokens.t: And made Israel to pass through the midst of it: for his mercy

verses.plain: But overthrew Pharaoh and his host in the Red sea: for his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: But overthrew Pharaoh and his host in the Red sea: for his mercy

verses.plain: To him which led his people through the wilderness: for his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: To him which led his people through the wilderness: for his mercy

verses.plain: To him which smote great kings: for his mercy endureth for ever:

tokens.t: To him which smote great kings: for his mercy

verses.plain: And slew famous kings: for his mercy endureth for ever:

tokens.t: And slew famous kings: for his mercy

verses.plain: Sihon king of the Amorites: for his mercy endureth for ever:

tokens.t: Sihon king of the Amorites: for his mercy

verses.plain: And Og the king of Bashan: for his mercy endureth for ever:

tokens.t: And Og the king of Bashan: for his mercy

verses.plain: And gave their land for an heritage: for his mercy endureth for ever:

tokens.t: And gave their land for an heritage: for his mercy

verses.plain: Even an heritage unto Israel his servant: for his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: an heritage unto Israel his servant: for his mercy

verses.plain: Who remembered us in our low estate: for his mercy endureth for ever:

tokens.t: Who remembered us in our low estate: for his mercy

verses.plain: And hath redeemed us from our enemies: for his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: And hath redeemed us from our enemies: for his mercy

verses.plain: Who giveth food to all flesh: for his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: Who giveth food to all flesh: for his mercy

verses.plain: O give thanks unto the God of heaven: for his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: O give thanks unto the God of heaven: for his mercy

footnotes.text: to rule…: Heb. for the rulings by day
